messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] Digest Number 481
messages.msgSnippet: ... Yeah, but it looks like to me that the bottle baby was displaying strong preferences from the very beginning. My ex-husband, and his sister, will not, ever
messages.messageBody:
>
>
>One was breastfed
>until she was almost 3 and the other only (exclusivley)for a few
>weeks (nipple confusion, mommy confusion, call it what you will).
>The nurser eats anything including hot salsas, and other spicey foods
>any veggi, anything. While the bottler eats only familiar foods.
>

Yeah, but it looks like to me that the bottle baby was displaying strong
preferences from the very beginning.

My ex-husband, and his sister, will not, ever no-way try anything new,
especially if someone asks them to try it. They get really ticked off
if you ask them to. It's like they have one-track taste buds.

To each their own.

Tuck
